results.name: Matrix inverse of partition triangle A008284.
comment: Since A008284 has only ones in its first column, the sum of terms for any row n > 1 is 0. - _François Marques_, Feb 09 2021
formula: T(n,n-k) = A010815(k) for k <= n/2. - _François Marques_, Feb 09 2021
program: (PARI) tp(n, k) = if (n<1, 0, if (k<1, 0, if (k == n, 1, if (k > n, 0, tp(n-1, k-1) + tp(n-k, k)))));
tabl(nn) = {mtp = matrix(nn, nn, n, k, tp(n, k)); mtpi = mtp^(-1); for (n = 1, nn, for (k = 1, n, print1(mtpi[n, k], ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 04 2014
